Package ohos.agp.text

Class TextForm

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.agp.text.TextForm

  • public class TextForm
extends Object
    Represents the rich text form. The TextForm object is used for creating a RichTextBuilder object.
    Since:
    3
    See Also:
    RichTextBuilder

    • Constructor Summary

      TextForm​()
      Default constructor used to create a TextForm instance.

      • setTextSize

        public TextForm setTextSize​(int size)
        Sets the text size.
        Parameters:
        size - Indicates the text size to set, in pixels. The value must be greater than 0.
        Returns:
        Returns this TextForm object with the specified text size.
        Since:
        3

      • setStrikethrough

        public TextForm setStrikethrough​(boolean strikethrough)
        Sets whether to add a strikethrough for this text.
        Parameters:
        strikethrough - Specifies whether to add a strikethrough. The value true means to add a strikethrough, and false (default value) means the opposite.
        Returns:
        Returns the current TextForm object.
        Since:
        3

      • getStrikethrough

        public boolean getStrikethrough​()
        Checks whether a strikethrough is added for this text.
        Returns:
        Returns true if a strikethrough is added for this text; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        3
        See Also:
        setStrikethrough(boolean)

        Returns the current TextForm object.
